org.treetank.service.xml.xpath
Class PipelineBuilder

java.lang.Object
  org.treetank.service.xml.xpath.PipelineBuilder

public final class PipelineBuilder
extends Object

PipeBuilder

Builder of a query execution plan in the pipeline manner.

PipelineBuilder

public PipelineBuilder(INodeReadTrx pRtx)
Constructor.

Method Detail

getPipeStack

public Stack<ExpressionSingle> getPipeStack()
Returns:
the current pipeline stack

addExpr

public void addExpr()
Adds a new pipeline stack to the stack holding all expressions.

finishExpr

public void finishExpr(INodeReadTrx mTransaction,
                       int mNum)
Ends an expression. This means that the currently used pipeline stack will be emptied and the singleExpressions that were on the stack are combined by a sequence expression, which is lated added to the next pipeline stack.

Parameters:
mTransaction - transaction to operate on
mNum - number of singleExpressions that will be added to the sequence

addExpressionSingle

public void addExpressionSingle()
Adds a new single expression to the pipeline. This is done by adding a complete new chain to the stack because the new single expression has nothing in common with the previous expressions.

getExpression

public ExpressionSingle getExpression()
Returns the current pipeline. If there is no existing pipeline, a new one is generated and returned.

Returns:
a reference to the currently used pipeline.

addForExpression

public void addForExpression(int mForConditionNum)
Adds a for expression to the pipeline. In case the for expression has more then one for condition, the for expression is converted to a nested for expression with only one for condition each, see the following example: for $a in /a, $b in /b, $c in /c return /d is converted to for $a in /a return for $b in /b return for $c in /c return /d

Parameters:
mForConditionNum - Number of all for conditions of the expression

addIfExpression

public void addIfExpression(INodeReadTrx mTransaction)
Adds a if expression to the pipeline.

Parameters:
mTransaction - Transaction to operate with.

public void addCompExpression(INodeReadTrx mTransaction,
                              String mComp)
Adds a comparison expression to the pipeline.

Parameters:
mTransaction - Transaction to operate with.
mComp - Comparator type.

                                boolean mIsIntersect)
Adds a intersect or a exception expression to the pipeline.

Parameters:
mTransaction - Transaction to operate with.
mIsIntersect - true, if expression is an intersection

public void addStep(org.treetank.axis.AbsAxis axis)
Adds a step to the pipeline.

Parameters:
axis - the axis step to add to the pipeline.

addStep

public void addStep(org.treetank.axis.AbsAxis axis,
                    org.treetank.axis.filter.AbsFilter mFilter)
Adds a step to the pipeline.

Parameters:
axis - the axis step to add to the pipeline.
mFilter - the node test to add to the pipeline.

getPipeline

public org.treetank.axis.AbsAxis getPipeline()
Returns a queue of all pipelines build so far and empties the pipeline stack.

Returns:
all build pipelines

addPredicate

public void addPredicate(INodeReadTrx mTransaction)
Adds a predicate to the pipeline.

Parameters:
mTransaction - Transaction to operate with.

addQuantifierExpr

public void addQuantifierExpr(INodeReadTrx mTransaction,
                              boolean mIsSome,
                              int mVarNum)
Adds a SomeExpression or an EveryExpression to the pipeline, depending on the parameter isSome.

Parameters:
mTransaction - Transaction to operate with.
mIsSome - defines whether a some- or an EveryExpression is used.
mVarNum - number of binding variables

addCastableExpr

public void addCastableExpr(INodeReadTrx mTransaction,
                            SingleType mSingleType)
Adds a castable expression to the pipeline.

Parameters:
mTransaction - Transaction to operate with.
mSingleType - single type the context item will be casted to.

public void addRangeExpr(INodeReadTrx mTransaction)

addInstanceOfExpr

public void addInstanceOfExpr(INodeReadTrx mTransaction,
                              SequenceType mSequenceType)
Adds a instance of expression to the pipeline.

Parameters:
mTransaction - Transaction to operate with.
mSequenceType - sequence type the context item should match.

addTreatExpr

public void addTreatExpr(INodeReadTrx mTransaction,
                         SequenceType mSequenceType)
Adds a treat as expression to the pipeline.

Parameters:
mTransaction - Transaction to operate with.
mSequenceType - sequence type the context item will be treated as.

addVariableExpr

public void addVariableExpr(INodeReadTrx mTransaction,
                            String mVarName)
Adds a variable expression to the pipeline. Adds the expression that will evaluate the results the variable holds.

Parameters:
mTransaction - Transaction to operate with.
mVarName - name of the variable

addFunction

public void addFunction(INodeReadTrx mTransaction,
                        String mFuncName,
                        int mNum)
                 throws TTXPathException
Adds a function to the pipeline.

Parameters:
mTransaction - Transaction to operate with.
mFuncName - The name of the function
mNum - The number of arguments that are passed to the function
Throws:
TTXPathException - if function can't be added

addVarRefExpr

public void addVarRefExpr(INodeReadTrx mTransaction,
                          String mVarName)
Adds a VarRefExpr to the pipeline. This Expression holds a reference to the current context item of the specified variable.

Parameters:
mTransaction - the transaction to operate on.
mVarName - the name of the variable

public String toString()
